title: Hobbit Farmer (1C295)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 1 • Hobbit
Strength:	2
Vitality:	2
Site:	1
Game Text:	While you can spot your site 1, this ally has the game text of that site. Fellowship: Exert this ally and spot opponent's site 1 to replace it with your site 1.
Lore:	”'…where our hearts truly lie is in peace and quiet and good-tilled earth….'”
Rarity:	C
